title: 服务器无法PVP
author: cheltao233
txt_content:
rt，服务器无法PVp，插件： Plugins (58): EpicCraftings, MayhemTowerDefense, NewCustomCuiLian, GroupManager, PlaceholderAPI, GokiStats, BetterChairs, FreeSwitchTitle, Multikills, Yum, ViaVersion, WorldEdit, FastCraft, ProtectItem, LevelChangeTips, ProtocolLib, baoshi, RedPacket, clear, NOUnlimitedPickup, Music, Vault, PvPrank, GUIQD, Lores, ScriptBlock, NeverLag, Trading, QuickShop, Marriage, PlayerPoints, ChestCommands, BetterRTP, CrazyEnchantments, Essentials, PlotMe, ColorMOTD, Citizens, Residence, CrazyAuctions, EssentialsChat, PlotMe-DefaultGenerator, WhitePay, MangoQuest, ItemLoreStats, MoreFish, EssentialsProtect, EssentialsAntiBuild, EssentialsSpawn, RPG_Items, Multiverse-Core, InfoBoardReborn, AuthMe, HolographicDisplays, EpicGuild, HolographicScoreboard, CommandNPC, AntiCraft
ILS有战斗提示，但是打不出伤害，mv的pvp也设置为true了，server的pvp也设置为true了，ils的特效也打得出伤害，但是剑的伤害就是打不出来，还有弓的，求助，急！

replies.author: huangchen55
replies.txt_content: 所以前端有受到伤害吗

replies.author: cheltao233
replies.txt_content:
huangchen55 发表于 2019-1-18 16:00
所以前端有受到伤害吗
前端是什么【傻子发问】

replies.author: qq的小辣鸡
replies.txt_content: 打开你的server.properties 里面选项中有个PVP=false 你把他改成true 就行

replies.author: cheltao233
replies.txt_content:
qq的小辣鸡 发表于 2019-1-18 20:27
打开你的server.properties 里面选项中有个PVP=false 你把他改成true 就行
是true但是没用

replies.author: mc能吃吗
replies.txt_content:
Ess是否设置了PVP为ture
如果不是就ture

replies.txt_content:
